context.p: Numbers in parentheses refer to Fig. 1.

step.cmd: Install brackets (18) on transmission (1) and loosely secure with bolts (15 and 16) and lockwashers (17). Tap brackets (18) with a copper hammer to ensure that shoulders butt then securely tighten bolts (15 and 16).
If removed fit ring (34) to trunnion (2) with the lip up and pointing to the front. If removed, fit shock mounts (5) to trunnion (2). Install trunnion (2) assembly to transmission (1).

Coat splines of input shaft with EP, NLGI molybdenum grease and fit input flange (33), retainer plate (32) and flange nut (31) on transmission (1). Tighten flange nut (31) to a torque of 960 Nm (710 lbf ft).
Ensure transmission output shaft is in the most outward position and the bearing between the shaft shoulder and the flange is tight against the shaft shoulder.
